alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 11:51AM EST until February 19 at 2:24PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Cuyahoga River At Independence affecting Cuyahoga County. Cuyahoga River At Old Portage affecting Summit County. Killbuck Creek Near Killbuck affecting Holmes and Wayne Counties. Mahoning River At Warren affecting Trumbull County. Mahoning River At Leavittsburg affecting Trumbull County. Mahoning River At Youngstown affecting Mahoning and Trumbull Counties. For the Cuyahoga River...including Old Portage, Independence...Major flooding is forecast. For the Killbuck Creek...including Killbuck...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mahoning River At Warren. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Property near the river south of Market Street flooded, including South Park and Pine Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 4.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 13.2 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.0 feet on 02/07/2008. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 945 PM EST.
